name: Rocky Saves The Earth
description:
Massive thanks to DarkNightStudio for the Linux export. 

ROBOTS! FROM OUTER SPACE!!

Help Rocky defend the Earth with his random magical rock ability to shoot lasers from his face to stop a random invasion of Robots from space!
Unlock costumes, get the high-score and become a bud while you're at it! Once again, everything you see was all created by myself in MS paint! #skills and for the first time the music was composed by yours truly. All compiled in GameMaker 8. HELL, if you feel bad about downloading it for free you could always donate? Funds go towards the show and making more games for you guys!

CONTROLS

Left and Right key to aim.

Up and Down key to change ammo types (between normal, spread shot and rapid fire).

Space to fire. With normal shit selected, how space for a charge shot.
